div.p:
3D Camera LoL the software can rotate or change the perspective in the game League of Legends. A perfect application for professional gamers in the live stream.
3D Camera LoL software will help you change the viewing angle while playing the game, 4 and 6 keys will help you rotate the right and left horizontal screen, 2 and 8 keys will help you rotate the screen up and down. 3D Camera LoL software is a product that many people believe this use from 2015 and has more than 100,000 users worldwide.
Also this software also means less professional help players live stream efficiency, increase gaming experience than the zoom mode, the zoom mode will be seen near the character that you're playing as well as all employees another player character and layout of the map.
When playing you can press the Home button to return to the default camera, very easy to use and simple to experience immediate download
